alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess; Western Ulster (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 17 at 3:53PM EST until December 19 at 4:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM SATURDAY TO 4 AM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches with ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Litchfield County in northwestern Connecticut and Dutchess and Ulster Counties in eastern New York. * WHEN...From 7 AM Saturday to 4 AM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to snow covered roads and reduced visibilities in the snowfall. The snow will begins to mix with and transition to sleet, freezing rain and plain rain in the afternoon into the early evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Dutchess; Eastern Ulster; Western Dutchess; Western Ulster
